name: Blob Buddy
description:
Poke and prod to your heart's content.

The harder the impact, the more coins you get!

The menu in the upper left corner gives access to the following:

  • Purchasing and equipping new Themes, Colors, and Hats.
  • Toggling in-game sound.
  • Access to the coin shop.
  • Resetting the blob in the event that he gets stuck.
  • Quitting the application.

Secret mini-game!
If your blob flies off the top of the stage, a hidden game mode will start that tracks how high you can get him to go. You'll be rewarded upon landing with coins based off of how much you beat your high score.
